original_title: Systematisch slordig Bram de Does letterontwerper & typograaf.
overview: This documentary film about Bram de Does records the personal motives and emotions of this very talented Dutch type-designer. Friends, printers, other typographers, professors in book history, and other collagues from three generations tell of their own personal relationship to Bram de Does and their professional relationship and evaluation with his type-designs.
title: Systematically sloppy: Bram de Does, font designer and typographer
